message: still plenty of things to get figured out, but it's moving in a very positive direction
Where are you at with getting an Avondale location going?
well i am all up for anything that i can do to assist with the Avondale push.  i think that is what got me into the user groups is the fact that i work alone.  plus i volunteered for the fall dcc
That would work great.  I have talked a bit to Derek about it.
we have still only scratched the surface in reaching >1% of the available market of people on the east side
my philosophy is that if you are doing something remarkable, people will come to it, regardless of the distance
we have tried to institute a practice where we meet face to face at least once
it's so easy to be virtual these days, but so difficult to really work together at a distance
that and it's very hard to affect change at a distance
absolutely!
everybody says that there are no tech people on the westside but that is probably cuz there isnt a place to meet
yeah, phoenix is just so spread out it's very difficult to connect with people
I would be happy to setup shop there.  I work at home for a company back east.  i do travel from time to time though so not sure about total commitment of everyday of every week.
Yes I was only at GP after dcc and i love the vibe
yeah physical proximity is so important
yea i talked to Roy about that.  i have clients that i have never met in 3 years!
we've had plenty of clients that I've never met in person, especially European ones, it sure makes the relationship different
it should.  damned internet makes everything impersonal
talked a lot to Roy and I am impressed with his "maturity" at his age.
no kidding, he is a really great guy
http://gangplankhq.com/2011/04/avondale-as-a-potential-partner/
Peoria => Chandler is 44 miles which isnt bad if NO traffic.
we'll have plenty of space for hosting user group meetings too. hint hint.
i think there would be a lot more participation if there were something cnetral or west phx
yes and you guys are actually working on site with that candy company just up the road.  that shows them commitment and they can see what the are getting for their dime
every day of every week is not required
love your guys work practices and i think a lot of people could learn/benefit by them
put it to you this way, i was so jealous of the close nitness (that a word?) that i spoke to my boss about moving to VA
3 years of working alone and remotely
we are going to struggle with that as we grow our team beyond Phoenix
it helps us to not be a faceless dev shop that is easily replaceable
it's just northwest of the historic downtown area
I don't have the exact address right now
So where in Avondale are you guys looking at aproximately?
do you guys have a particular location in mind or are you still looking for a place?
That's cool just curious of area Avondale is huge lol
we have a very specific location scoped out, but still many hurdles to get over to make it happen
well let me know if I can help in any way.
stoked.
absolutely!  there are obviously people on the west side looking for a home!!!
Can't wait to see Avondale get off the ground.
Hey! How do I jump into Gangplank Avondale? I would love to help get it off the ground. I have skills and stuff. http://OhSocial.com -- Carole
Right now we are collecting info from interested parties. Since you filled out the form, we will be sure to give you updates as soon as possible!
Thanks Katie!
I heard good news that the Avondale location is coming along so I hope to hear more soon!!
If you guys need some help on the west side to get Avondale going just let me know
Has your avondale location opened? I submitted an application this evening in hopes that it is. I live in buckeye and looking for a "permanent" space for a few months
It is not open yet.  We are hoping next quarter.
